Info.Description:
HUD Object Display Files
This base package makes 3 files able to be modified by a3 packages: [list] [*] hudproperties_default.ndb: used for display of icons (like pickup weapons, etc) on the HUD. [/list]
Other Information: [list] [*] [color=yellow]If a mod collides with this base package, then just simply disable this package, because a mod you want to use probably contains these files.[/color] [/list]
Credits: [list] [*] [size=1][color=lightgreen]Author: [/color][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/32262030][b]LinkHero95[/b][/url][/size] [/list]
